◆ main()

int main ( int argc,
char * argv[] )

Main of the programm.

Parameters
argcNumber of arguments
argvList of arguments that are: path to csv and total time

< Path of SenseCom Application (Update the path if you're running on another PC)

< returns true if SenseCom is active

< Path to .CSV file where data are write

< Total time duration of the data acquisition. If it is ugual to -1, the time is unlimited

< Verify the first iteration of the data acquisition loop

< Essential condition to get data from haptic gloves

< Used when there is the last value to be written in the .CSV file
